gmOnly.name: GM Only
gmOnly.hint: Enable for GM only, if disabled players will be able to see the folder tree for any scene they have permission to view.

autoHide.name: Auto Hide
autoHide.hint: Automatically fade out the navigation bar when not in use.

useNavigation.name: Show only scene in Navigation
useNavigation.hint: If enalbed show only scenes marked as 'Show in Navigation' for the GM, otherwise show all scenes. Players will always only see scenes marked as 'Show in Navigation' for players.

clickViewScene.name: Click to View Scene
clickViewScene.hint: If enabled clicking on a scene in the sidebar will view the scene instead of opening the scene configuration.

dynamicSorting.name: Dynamic Sorting
dynamicSorting.hint: If enabled, the active scene will always be first and the viewed scene will always be second.
